metadata.title: CVE-2024-45338 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker can craft an input to the Parse functions that would beprocessed non-linearly with respect to its length, resulting in extremelyslow parsing. This could cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: google-guest-agent package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
containerd package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
golang-golang-x-net-dev package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
juju-core package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
lxd package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
